the_warlord:ExamplePower.NAME: Example Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Does something #b%1$s time.
Does something #b%1$s times.

the_warlord:AnticoagulantPower.NAME: Anticoagulant
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you parry, apply #b%1$s #yGush to ALL enemies.

the_warlord:BleedPower.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b%1$s HP at the start of turn, then reduce #yBleed by half.

the_warlord:GushPower.NAME: Gush
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, #yBleed is multiplied by #b1.5 instead of reduced by half, then reduce #yGush by #b1. #yGush only decays on #yBleeding enemies.

the_warlord:PunishmentPower.NAME: Punishment
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you #yParry, play #b%1$s additional #yParry cards.

the_warlord:PosturePower.NAME: Posture
DESCRIPTIONS: Unblocked #yAttack #yDamage is reduced by #b%1$s. Whenever you take unblocked #yAttack #yDamage, lose all #yPosture and gain #b1 #yTension. Reduce #yPosture by 1 at the start of your turn.

the_warlord:TensionPower.NAME: Tension
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy #yAttack #yDamage is increased by #b%1$s.

the_warlord:PostureStabilizedPower.NAME: Posture Stabilized
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPosture cannot be reduced for #b%1$s turn.
#yPosture cannot be reduced for #b%1$s turns.

the_warlord:PositioningPower.NAME: Positioning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yParry, gain #b%1$s #yDexterity.

the_warlord:BloodMagicPower.NAME: Blood Smoke
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yGush to a #yBleeding enemy, gain #b%1$s Block for each point of #yBleed on enemy.

the_warlord:GuardianFormPower.NAME: Guardian Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, shuffle #b%1$s #yDizzy into your draw pile.

the_warlord:QuickDrawPower.NAME: Quick Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Parry, draw #b%1$s card.
Whenever you Parry, draw #b%1$s cards.

the_warlord:CorneredPower.NAME: Cornered
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your #yAttack #yDamage by #b%1$s for each point of #yTension you have.

the_warlord:BloodLinkPower.NAME: Blood Link
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Status, apply #b%1$s #yBleed to ALL enemies.

the_warlord:BoilingBloodPower.NAME: Boiling Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b%1$s #yBleed.

the_warlord:ParryPower.NAME: Parrying Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Block an attack without taking damage and without having any Block left over, play 1 out of 3 random Parry cards from your Parry deck at the start of your next turn.

the_warlord:ReactionTimePower.NAME: Reaction Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Allows #yParrying attacks that are within #b%1$s of your current Block. Reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn.

the_warlord:TenseUpPower.NAME: Tense Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yTension, gain #b%1$s #yPosture.

the_warlord:SupportingFirePower.NAME: Supporting Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack card, gain #b%1$s Block.

the_warlord:NextTurnSyrettePower.NAME: Stimulus
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #ySyrette to your hand at the start of next turn
Add a #ySyrette to your hand at the start of next #b%1$s turns.

the_warlord:EndlessNextTurnSyrettePower.NAME: Stimulation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%1$s #ySyrette into your hand.

the_warlord:TempThornsPower.NAME: Temporary Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, deals #b%1$s damage back. Lose all #yTemporary #yThorns at the start of next turn.

the_warlord:FocusPunchPower.NAME: Focus Punch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, deal #b%1$s damage. NL If you take damage, gain #b%2$s #yTension.

the_warlord:DoubleTeamPower.NAME: Double Team
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next card this turn is played an additional time.
Your next #b%1$s cards this turn are played an additional time.

the_warlord:EndlessNextTurnReactionTimeP.NAME: Adaptive Reaction
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b%1$s #yReaction #yTime.

the_warlord:SelfDrawReductionPower.NAME: Draw Reduction
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 less card next turn.
Draw #b1 less card for #b
turns.

the_warlord:AnticipationPower.NAME: Anticipation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, put #b%1$s card from your draw pile into your hand. Draw #b%1$s fewer card each turn.
At the start of your turn, put #b%1$s cards from your draw pile into your hand. Draw #b%1$s fewer cards each turn.

the_warlord:EndlessNextTurnDexterityPowe.NAME: Adaptive Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b%1$s #yDexterity.

the_warlord:RefugePower.NAME: Refuge
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b%1$s #yStrength if you have #yPosture, and gain #b%1$s #yDexterity if you have #yTension.

the_warlord:MarchingSongPower.NAME: Marching Song
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b4 cards, draw a card.
Whenever you play #b4 cards, draw #b%1$s cards.

the_warlord:TensionPerTurnPower.NAME: Increasing Tension
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%1$s #yTension at the start of each turn.
